fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Brawlers activate the <Withstand> skill with every 4 basic attacks
• The skill provides __damage immunity__ all friendly units within range.
• The skill lasts 4 seconds; as long as Brawlers keep attacking (1 attack each second), the skill would not be dropped.
• The skill can stack to provide maximum 75% immunity.
• Damage immunity: 10% / 13% / 16% / 18% / 20% / 21% / 22% / 23% / 25%

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value:
• Brawlers are essential in Honor Hunting. Typically 3-4 Brawlers are recommanded.
• Brawlers are essential in Infinity War. Number of units may vary from day to day.
• Brawlers are heavily used in Arthur formation due to Arthur’s healing ability
